About Me

I am a first-year undergraduate student at Brown University, concentrating in Mathematics-Computer Science and Urban Studies. As a student researcher and developer, I‚Äôm broadly excited about anything related to symbolic systems, sociotechnical infrastructures, and participatory or distributed AI. I‚Äôm also making my way to explore downstream (ideally grassroots) solutions that leverage technologies to empower marginalized communities.
